name: The World Needs Biscuits!
description:
YOU HUMANS HAVE SERVED YOUR PURPOSE! NOW THAT THE WORLD IS ONE, YOU SHALL ALL BE REWARDED FOR YOUR SERVICES... A BISCUIT!

HOW TO PLAY

DROP CORRECT BISCUIT IN HUMAN MOUTH

EVERY 10 SECONDS THE FACTORY BELT SPEEDS UP

CONTROLS

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - pick up (hold) biscuit

W/D - pan camera

-----------------------------

BUG FIXES [Tue, 04 Oct 2022 01:40:18 GMT]:

-Fixed game breaking bug: debug in godot was not detecting case sensitive strings in preload() scripts

-Fixed memory leak: instances were not being deleted efficiently enough, slowing down the game (and could probably be further optimised)

KNOWN BUGS:
-Sometimes the biscuit conveyor belt gets jammed and biscuits get stuck in the oven (you can still pluck them out for fun)

-The game can get quite laggy in HTML5, especially in the more advanced levels and with conveyor belt speeds.*

*I would recommend downloading the PC version for a smoother biscuit experience.
